A rule of inference (for a given language) of type Modus Ponens, is any element from the following set: <math display="block">\{(\{\alpha, \alpha \rightarrow \beta\}, \beta) \mid \alpha \text { and } \beta \text { are formulas of } \mathcal{L}\}</math>
